Interview Prep Text

To succeed in a job interview, 1. Prepare and read about the company 2. Showcase your strengths and 3. Maintain a positive attitude. These characteristics will help you get a job.

✅ 1. Before the Interview — Get Ready Like a Pro

  • Know the Company: Visit their website, read the About Us page, know their mission and recent projects.
  • Know the Role: Re-read the job description and list 3 skills you have that match what they want.
  • Practice Answers:
    • “Tell me about yourself”
    • “Why do you want to work here?”
    • “What are your strengths and weaknesses?”

✅ 2. During the Interview — Show the Best Version of You

  • Speak with Confidence: Don’t rush. Pause if needed. Smile and stay positive.
  • Ask Good Questions: Show interest by asking:
    • “What does success look like in this role?”
    • “What’s something you love about working here?”
  • Dress the Part: Even if casual, dress one step more professional.

✅ 3. After the Interview — Stand Out Even More

  • Send a Thank You Email: Thank them and mention something specific from the conversation.
“Thank you again for today’s interview. I especially enjoyed learning about your approach to team projects — it really aligns with how I love to collaborate.”

✨ Final Tips:

  • Be yourself — your most prepared and positive self.
  • Don’t memorize answers — just know your main points.
  • Practice with a friend, in front of a mirror, or record yourself.
